exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type n : nat x0 : T u : nat -> T i : nat H : (i < S n)%nat Unable to unify "u i" with "match i with | 0%nat => fst (mk_Tn (S n) u) | S i => (fix coeff_Tn (T : Type) (n : nat) (x0 : T) {struct n} : Tn n T -> nat -> T := match n as n0 return (Tn n0 T -> nat -> T) with | 0%nat => fun (_ : Tn 0 T) (_ : nat) => x0 | S n' => fun (v : Tn (S n') T) (i0 : nat) => match i0 with | 0%nat => fst v | S i1 => coeff_Tn T n' x0 (snd v) i1 end end) T n x0 (snd (mk_Tn (S n) u)) i end".

original: intros i H. unfold coeff_Tn. destruct n. - inversion H. - reflexivity.
